text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
EL PAIS
- ETA (Basque separatist group) kidnaps (governing) Popular Party town councillor and threatens to kill him in 48 hours
- (Former head of covert operations) Perote, sentenced to seven years and expelled from army
EL MUNDO
- ETA kidnaps PP town councillor and threatens to kill him tomorrow
- Military court sentences Perote to seven years jail for divulging secrets
DIARIO 16
- Hunt the beasts
ABC
- State blackmail: ETA threatens to kill Basque PP town councillor if the government doesn't change prison policy
CINCO DIAS
- Skies have no-one to control them
- (Economy Minister) Rato opens elections in (savings bank group) CECA to substitute (chairman) Medel
- Government sacks tax office director general Bermejo
EXPANSION
- BBV funds control one percent of Argentaria
- Labour reform doubles fixed contracts in June
- Tabacalera buys Californian group Max Rohr for 7.9 billion pesetas
GACETA DE LOS NEGOCIOS
- Investment funds attract nearly five trillion pesetas to May
- Bank of England hikes base rates for third time
- Government divides steel and telecommunications between France and Italy
